select a.* from article a
left join (select article_id, count(id) as amount from approval_article group by article_id) app_amount on a.id = app_amount.article_id
where a.text like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or a.category like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or a.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by app_amount.amount desc
limit ${pageSize*(page-1)},#{pageSize}

select a.* from article a
left join (select goal_article_id, count(id) as amount from article_reply ar group by ar.goal_article_id) ar_amount on ar_amount.goal_article_id = a.id
where a.text like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or a.category like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or a.title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by ar_amount.amount desc
limit ${pageSize*(page-1)},#{pageSize}
